channel.title: Is this possible? to do this,.. -->
channel.description:
how can u make it so when lvl 4s join my server there hp is =10 so there a lvl 3?
+ how can i make my [server source] a lil bit slower exp??
+ how can i get the [style] like [rs godswords]?

item.title: Is this possible? to do this,.. -->
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

well i found this in client.java,…

inCombat(); if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double) (200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double) (200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double) (200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence); } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double) (200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double) (200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);

changed the 750 to 200 and the lvls r still fast,… :o

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible? to do this,.. -->
item.dc:creator: @kapstok kapstok
item.description:
@kapstok wrote:

slower xp(meele)
search for

inCombat();

you should get this:

inCombat(); if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double) (750 * hitDiff); //my speed of xp for atk TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double) (750 * hitDiff);//my speed of xp for str TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double) (750 * hitDiff);//my speed of xp of def TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence); } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double) (700 * hitDiff);//my server controlled xp TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); }change them lower for slower xp rate

have fun

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible? to do this,.. -->
item.dc:creator: @kapstok kapstok
item.description:
@kapstok wrote:

thats easy(the first one)
go to player.java
and edit the skills
like this

for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) { // Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 98; playerXP[i] = 1155;
that means

if (i ==3)skill number

playerLevel[i] = 98hp lvl

playerXP[i] = 1155;[/XP
so you can change the 98 to 10
and the xp to 1155 get it?
